mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recommendation_api_bond (bondsurlNm, isinCdNm, fnScrItsmKcdNm, bondSrfcIntr, bondIntrTcdNm, bondExprDt, intPayCyclCtt) VALUES (#{issuerName}, #{productName}, #{creditRating}, #{surfaceRate}, #{interestType}, #{maturityDate}, #{interestPaymentCycle})
mapper.update: UPDATE recommendation_api_bond SET bondsurlNm = #{issuerName}, fnScrItsmKcdNm = #{creditRating}, bondSrfcIntr = #{surfaceRate}, bondIntrTcdNm = #{interestType}, bondExprDt = #{maturityDate}, intPayCyclCtt = #{interestPaymentCycle} WHERE isinCdNm = #{productName}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM recommendation_api_bond WHERE isinCdNm = #{productName}
